ARGUMENT
x y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | xpccat.t | |- T = ( C Xc. D ) |
| 2 |  | xpccat.c | |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) |
| 3 |  | xpccat.d | |- ( ph -> D e. Cat ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` C ) = ( Base ` C ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` D ) = ( Base ` D ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Id ` C ) = ( Id ` C ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Id ` D ) = ( Id ` D ) |
| 8 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 | #P_xpccatid | |- ( ph -> ( T e. Cat /\ ( Id ` T ) = ( x e. ( Base ` C ) , y e. ( Base ` D ) |-> <. ( ( Id ` C ) ` x ) , ( ( Id ` D ) ` y ) >. ) ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_simpld | |- ( ph -> T e. Cat ) |
